§ 122. National Flag Week The President is requested to issue each year a proclamation—(1) designating the week in which June 14 falls as National Flag Week; and
(2) calling on citizens to display the flag of the United States during National Flag Week.
(Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1259.)
